ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
This repository stores the Protobufs and generated code used for client-server
gRPC APIs in OpenSearch. It provides Python bindings for the OpenSearch protobuf
schemas and services, enabling gRPC communication with OpenSearch.
about.summary: OpenSearch Protobufs / Generated Code for client-server gRPC APIs

about.description:
This repository stores the Protobufs and generated code used for client-server
gRPC APIs in OpenSearch. It provides Python bindings for the OpenSearch protobuf
schemas and services, enabling gRPC communication with OpenSearch.
about.summary: OpenSearch Protobufs / Generated Code for client-server gRPC APIs

name: opensearch-protobufs
raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  name: opensearch-protobufs
  version: "1.1.0"

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

# Upstream issue tracking adding source distribution:
# https://github.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-protobufs/issues/307
# The wheel contains only generated Python protobuf/gRPC code (no compiled extensions),
# so installing from the pre-built wheel is equivalent to building from source.
source:
  - url: https://pypi.org/packages/py3/o/opensearch_protobufs/opensearch_protobufs-${{ version }}-py3-none-any.whl
    sha256: 34fe9de960b42851a7fc2b659d76ea7f8fb686435672de45e397a6106c9c5cd1
  - url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-protobufs/${{ version }}/LICENSE.txt
    sha256: 09e8a9bcec8067104652c168685ab0931e7868f9c8284b66f5ae6edae5f1130b

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: python -m pip install opensearch_protobufs-${{ version }}-py3-none-any.whl

requirements:
  host:
    - python ${{ python_min }}.*
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=${{ python_min }}
    - grpcio >=1.70.0
    - protobuf >=3.25.8

tests:
  - python:
      python_version: ${{ python_min }}.*
      imports:
        - opensearch.protobufs.schemas
        - opensearch.protobufs.services
      pip_check: true

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-protobufs
  summary: OpenSearch Protobufs / Generated Code for client-server gRPC APIs
  description: |
    This repository stores the Protobufs and generated code used for client-server
    gRPC APIs in OpenSearch. It provides Python bindings for the OpenSearch protobuf
    schemas and services, enabling gRPC communication with OpenSearch.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  repository: https://github.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-protobufs

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - chrisburr
